meanings.definition: Made or shaped by a machine.
meanings.sent1: The machined parts fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent2: The machined surface was smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The machined toy looked like it came from the future.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as sleek and precise as a machined object.
meanings.sent5: The machined edges gleamed under the bright lights.

meanings.definition: To shape or finish by machine.
meanings.sent1: He machined the metal into a precise shape.
meanings.sent2: The factory machined the parts with great accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The robot machined the wood with robotic precision.
meanings.sent4: Time machined the landscape into something unrecognizable.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor machined the marble with expert skill.
